name: EMethod
tagline: Canada Website Design and Development Company
description:
EMethod's primary service is simple... help generate leads using the Internet for any size company in any industry. Then we offer a custom solution for lead management called ClickHook.
To help generate leads online we design and build beautiful, high-converting websites and then rank those websites on Google. We also help set up and optimize AdWords campaigns and Facebook ads. Of course, we will setup analytics and tracking and provide insights into all your online data.
